data.market_trends: Sustainable travel and experiential stays are resurging trends. Eco-tours and cultural immersions are becoming more prevalent.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers increasingly prefer online bookings and are heavily influenced by user-generated content on social media.
data.competitive_landscape: Competitors are investing in digital marketing and local partnerships to enhance visibility and attract tourists.
data.seasonal_factors: Winter snowpack affects ski season, while summer temperatures influence beach tourism. Both are critical factors for planning.
